name: cphsca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))

comment: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a vector space over a subfield of ` CCfld ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
